item.title: Introducing b2tob3: Easier Migration to Bootstrap 3
item.description: b2tob3 is a command line tool to help migrate Web projects from bootstrap 2 to bootstrap 3 by performing a set of replacements that reflect bootstrap 3 class name changes.

item.title: Quick and Dirty Site Monitoring with Google Apps Script
item.description: A tutorial on how to use Google Drive and Apps Script to set up a free Website monitoring service that runs on Google's infrastructure.

item.title: Taking Web Page Screenshots with PhantomJS and Python
item.description: A brief tutorial on how to create screenshots with common browser resolutions and save them as PNG files using PhantomJS and Python.
